00025 #include <libssh/libssh.h>
00026 
00067 class U_EXPORT USSHSocket : public UTCPSocket {
00068 public:
00069 
00070         // COSTRUTTORI
00071 
00072         USSHSocket(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false) : UTCPSocket(bSocketIsIPv6)
00073                 {
00074                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USSHSocket, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00075 
00076                 buffer  = 0;
00077                 channel = 0;
00078                 ret     = auth = 0;
00079                 user    = public_key = private_key = 0;
00080 
00081                 session = (ssh_session) U_SYSCALL_NO_PARAM(ssh_new);
00082                 }
00083 
00084         ~USSHSocket()
00085                 {
00086                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USSHSocket)
00087 
00088                 close();
00089 
00090                 if (buffer) U_SYSCALL_VOID(buffer_free, "%p", buffer);
00091                 }
00092 
00093         // VARIE
00094 
00095         void close();
00096 
00097         const char* getError();
00098 
00099         bool SSHConnection(int fd);
00100 
00101         void setUser(const char* _user)
00102                 {
00103                 U_TRACE(1, "USSHSocket::setUser(%S)", _user)
00104 
00105                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(_user)
00106 
00107                 user = _user;
00108 
00109                 (void) U_SYSCALL(ssh_options_set, "%p,%d,%S", session, SSH_OPTIONS_USER, user);
00110                 }
00111 
00112         void setKey(const char* _private_key = "/%U/.ssh/id_rsa",
00113                                         const char*  _public_key = "/%U/.ssh/id_rsa.pub")
00114                 {
00115                 U_TRACE(1, "USSHSocket::setKey(%S,%S)", _private_key, _public_key)
00116 
00117                 public_key  = _public_key;
00118                 private_key = _private_key;
00119                 }
00120 
00121         void setVerbosity(int num = -1)
00122                 {
00123                 U_TRACE(1, "USSHSocket::setVerbosity(%d)", num)
00124 
00125                 (void) U_SYSCALL(ssh_options_set, "%p,%d,%p", session, SSH_OPTIONS_LOG_VERBOSITY, &num);
00126                 }
00127 
00128         void sendEOF()
00129                 {
00130                 U_TRACE(1, "USSHSocket::sendEOF()")
00131 
00132                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(channel)
00133 
00134                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(channel_send_eof, "%p", channel);
00135                 }
00136 
00137         // VIRTUAL METHOD
00138 
00139         virtual int send(const void* pData,   int iDataLen);
00140         virtual int recv(      void* pBuffer, int iBufferLen);
00141 
00147         virtual bool connectServer(const UString& server, int iServPort) // 22
00148                 {
00149                 U_TRACE(1, "USSHSocket::connectServer(%.*S,%d)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(server), iServPort)
00150 
00151                 if (UTCPSocket::connectServer(server, iServPort))
00152                         {
00153                         const char* srv = server.c_str();
00154 
00155                         (void) U_SYSCALL(ssh_options_set, "%p,%d,%S", session, SSH_OPTIONS_HOST, srv);
00156                         (void) U_SYSCALL(ssh_options_set, "%p,%d,%p", session, SSH_OPTIONS_PORT, &iServPort);
00157 
00158                         if (SSHConnection(USocket::iSockDesc)) U_RETURN(true);
00159                         }
00160 
00161                 U_RETURN(false);
00162                 }
00163 
00164 #ifdef DEBUG
00165         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00166 #endif

00171         ssh_channel channel;

00173         const char* public_key;
00174         const char* private_key;

00177         const char* status() U_NO_EXPORT;
00178         const char* status(int n) { ret = n; return status(); }

00182         USSHSocket& operator=(const USSHSocket&)                          { return *this; }
